title: Bitcoin Could Drop to $58K as Cool-Off Period Is Imminent, Swissblock Says
description: Bitcoin nearly doubled in price since late January, but a "counter move seems to be near," Swissblock analysts said.

title: MicroStrategy Seeks $500 Million to Snatch Up Even More Bitcoin
description: Software company MicroStrategy says it plans to offer up $500 million in convertible senior notes due in 2031 to buy up Bitcoin.

title: Cleartoken Secures $10M in Funding to Pioneer UK’s First Digital Asset Clearing House
description: On Monday, the crypto clearing house startup Cleartoken revealed that it raised $10 million from strategic investors including Nomura’s Laser Digital, Flow Traders, and LMAX Digital. Cleartoken Nets $10M to Launch U.K. Digital Asset Clearing Services The horizontal clearing house for the digital asset market, Cleartoken, revealed that it’s raised $10 million in order to […]

title: TRON PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (March 13) – TRX Undergoes Retracement: Targets This Key Trendline For Rebound
description: Amidst the latest increase across the crypto space, Tron TRX took a bow and continued to retrace downward on the daily chart. title: WAVES PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (March 13) – Waves Breaks Out Following A 30% Daily Surge: Sets For A Bigger Move
description: After facing some hurdles in the past months, Waves finally broke out and tapped a year high today. It temporarily halted buying and retraced briefly. title: XRP Price Surges 15%: Ripple CEO Highlights Opportunity for Value Creation Ahead of Critical Deadline
description: XRP price has maintained a positive weekly growth amid uncertainty in the leftover of the SEC lawsuit. XRP’s luster hinges on its value proposition as a viable asset transfer protocol. Despite recent market fluctuations, XRP, the cryptocurrency associated with Ripple Labs Inc, has shown resilience, surging nearly 15% in weekly gains. This increase coincides with [...]
